Uses of Package
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.hooks

Packages that use nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.hooks
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.config
This package contains classes responsible for handling the configuration files used by the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.hooks
This package contains classes responsible for providing compatibility with various third-party plugins.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.bundle
This package contains the bundle that contains all protection hooks.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.griefdefender2
This package contains the protection hook for GriefDefender 2.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.griefprevention
This package contains the protection hook for GriefPrevention.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.lands
This package contains the protection hook for Lands.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.plotsquared6
This package contains the protection hook for PlotSquared 6.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.plotsquared7
This package contains the protection hook for PlotSquared 7.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.redprotect
This package contains the protection hook for RedProtect.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.towny
This package contains the protection hook for Towny.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.worldguard7
This package contains the protection hook for WorldGuard 7.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.hooks
Contains a set of utility classes that provide compatibility with other plugins.
